entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EnC: consider reporting EditAndContinueErrorCode.DocumentIsOutOfSyncWithDebuggee warning if project doesn't specify SingleTargetBuildForStartupProjects property #78125
  • Custom BannedSymbols file name and extension #78124
  • OverrideCompletionProvider error in Razor files #78119
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.VisualBasic.UnitTests.Semantics.BinaryOperators.Test1 and Test5 are failing #78117
  • Visual Studio is adding unnecessary space between curly braces. #78115
  • Enable "build task" source generators via `RegisterImplementationSourceOutput` #78108
  • Compile collection expressions to using ImmutableArray when targeting read-only interfaces #78106

Closed

  • API for IgnoredDirectiveTrivia #77697

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/dev17.14] Disable failing Test1 and Test5 lines #78127
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge 2.72.27 into release/vscode to prepare patch #78126
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Cache MEF catalog in servicehub process #78122
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Testing bit prints on all platforms #78120
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix razor analyzer loading #78116
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Merge 'main' into UserDefinedCompoundAssignment #78113
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Cleanup how code is executed in our unit tests #78112
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement CRef binding for compound assignment operators #78111
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature-UserDefinedCompoundAssignmentOperators
  • Fix issue #70183: adjust the plural for expression collection #78110
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Use Extension as data type for Extension Message Handlers errors and remove DocumentLinePosition #78121
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, Next
  • Disable failing Test1 and Test5 lines #78118
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Support consumption of instance compound assignment operators #78087
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature-UserDefinedCompoundAssignmentOperators
  • Update ignored directives public API #77968
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Feature - Ignored Directives, Next

Updated

  • Fix VB tests on MacOSX #78024
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Delete unused test hook #78105
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Project system cleanups #78104
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update targets to reduce syntax tree recreations due to ParseOption changes #78093
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Generate documentation - update API shape #78067
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Move MiscellaneousFilesWorkspace construction to background thread #78051
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add support for FieldRva to EnC delta #78033
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Make partial interface members virtual #77379
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, breaking-change
  • Implement custom awaitable support #78071
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Runtime Async, Next
  • Update `RuntimeHelpers.Await` rules #77957
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Runtime Async
  • Extensions: nullability analysis for invocations and method groups #78080
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
